import { useState } from 'react' import BookmarkList from './BookmarkList' import './List.css' export default function List({item, book, setBook}){ const marking=(e)=>{ let id = String(e.target.id) console.log(id) setBook(...book,{ id: item.id, image_url: item.image_url || item.brand_image_url, title: item.title || item.brand_name, discountPercentage: item.discountPercentage, follower: item.follower, price: item.price, sub_title: item.sub_title }) console.log(document.querySelector(id)) document.querySelector('i').classList[3]? document.querySelector('i').classList.remove('onColoe') : document.querySelector('i').classList.add('onColor') } return(
{item.title || item.brand_name} {item.discountPercentage? {item.discountPercentage+`%`} : null} {item.follower? 관심고객수 : null}
{item.sub_title} {item.price? item.price+`원` : item.follower}
) }
